title: 5 drag assist not working
body: i have noticed in several game (last 6 or so) that with the new devourer, getting an assist to ally champ isnt giving the 5 stacks

replies.body: I believe you can only get the 5 stacks for the first time you slay dragon. The rest of the times you just get one. Including assists.
no im getting 0 stacks for assist 1st (assist) slay, any assist slay
